songs.title: Madame X
songs.lyrics:
Madame X is a secret agent
I' madame X
Traveling around the world
Changing identities
Fighting for freedom
Bringing light to dark places
I bring light to dark places
Madame X is a dancer
I'm a dancer
A professor
A head of state
A housekeeper
An equestrian
A prisoner
A student
A mother
A child
A teacher
A nun
A singer
A saint
A whore
A whore
I'm a spy in the house of Love
I'm madame X
X, X, X, I'm madame X
